title: Augmented Reality-Based Acoustic System Learning: Expert Course for Music Education Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical AR-based training for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, covering sound system design principles and operational methodologies applicable to real music education environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify and explain the components and functions of sound systems in a 3D space using AR tools.
Learners can demonstrate step-by-step the optimization process of a sound system in a simulated concert hall environment through augmented reality.
Learners can create a sound design plan applicable to elementary music classes based on AR learning experiences.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
